extensionName.message: Open bookmark in Container Tab menu item

extensionDescription.message: Add 'Open in Container Tab' menu item to bookmarks

open_one_in_container_tab.message: Open in a New Container Tab
open_one_in_container_tab.description: Label of item in the context menu of a bookmark. Language and capitalization should be consistent with built-in menu items such as 'Open in a New Tab'.

open_all_in_container_tab.description: Label of item in the context menu of a bookmark folder. Language and capitalization should be consistent with built-in menu items such as 'Open All in Tabs'.

no_container.description: Label of item in the submenu of the 'Open ... in Container' menu item.
